setting.title: Setting
setting.name: Name
setting.etc_setting_placeholder:
Input your personality or characteristics that other friends should know.

* Example: I like listening to music. My hobby is playing games while listening to songs.

chat.start_message: Start the conversation by adding my own friend bot!

confirm.delete1: Are you sure you're going to delete "{BOT_NAME}"?

Bot and all existing conversation history are deleted and cannot be recovered.

bot_setting.name: Name
bot_setting.etc_setting_placeholder:
Please directly enter the personality or characteristics of bot you want to set.

* Example: You are a princess living in the Middle Ages. Answer like a princess.
